description: February 8, 2013 This chart lists all of the state firearms legislation the Law Center is tracking as of February 8, 2013. Bills that address more than one policy area are listed multile times -- once for each policy area addressed. For more detailed and/or updated information, please go to www.smartgunlaws.org or call 415-433-2062, ext. 307.
